issue.title: [Python] Address docstrings in Streams and File Access (FileSystems)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16097](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16097). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ensure docstrings for [Streams and File Access](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/api/files.html) - File Systems- have an `Examples` section:

<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.LocalFileSystem.html#pyarrow.LocalFileSystem>
